channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: War Crime Prosecutions Enter a New Digital Age
item.description: A custom platform developed by SITU Research aided the International Criminal Court’s prosecution in a war crimes trial for the first time. It could c...

item.title: Sonia’s AI chatbot steps in for therapists
item.description: Can chatbots replace human therapists? Some startups — and patients — claim that they can. But it’s not exactly settled science. One study found that ...

item.title: How to Shop Like a Pro During Amazon Prime Day - July 2024
item.description: We’ve got tips to help you cut through the clutter to find real Amazon Prime Day deals.

item.title: Dream Chaser spaceplane is off the manifest for ULA’s second Vulcan launch
item.description: Sierra Space said that despite the slip, its first Dream Chaser spaceplane is still on track for its maiden mission before the end of the year. © 2024...

item.title: A Russian Propaganda Network Is Promoting an AI-Manipulated Biden Video
item.description: Experts tell WIRED that Russian disinformation campaigns are using generative AI more and more.

item.title: Google improves search experience in the Chrome mobile app
item.description: Facing new competition from startups like Arc, Google announced on Wednesday that it’s bringing five new features to the Chrome browser on mobile devi...

item.title: Supreme Court Rules That US Government Can Continue Talking to Social Media Companies
item.description: The SCOTUS ruling overturns an earlier injunction that prevented platforms from communicating with the government for more than a year.

item.title: Persona’s founders are certain the world can use another humanoid robot
item.description: At this early stage, Persona’s pitch doesn’t stray far from the various humanoid firms with which it’s set to compete. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights r...

item.title: The Best Hearing Aids of 2024, Reviewed by Experts
item.description: These WIRED-tested and audiologist-approved devices will help you hear sounds more clearly. Never miss out on a dinner conversation again.

item.title: This Week in AI: The fate of generative AI is in the courts’ hands
